roleset.name: confuse
roleset.note: CONFOUND-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from confound.01-v)

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: It is engendered [*-1] by [*]confounding the Aristotelian cosmology in TheAlmagest with the geocentric astronomy .
example.arg: the Aristotelian cosmology in The Almagest

example.name: passive, arg0 and arg1
example.text: [Travelers entering from the desert]-1 were confounded [*-1]by what [*T*-2] musthave seemed an illusion : a great garden filled [*] with nightingales and roses, cut [*] by canals and terraced promenades , studded [*] with water tanks ofturquoise tile in which were reflected [*T*-3] the glistening blue curves of ahundred domes .
example.arg: by what [*T*-2] must have seemed an illusion : a greatgarden filled [*]with nightingales and roses , cut [*] by canals and terracedpromenades , studded [*] with water tanks of turquoise tile in which werereflected [*T*-3] the glistening blue curves of a hundred domes
